decision_conditions: The development to which this permission relates shall be begun not later than the expiration of three years from the date of this permission.

Reason: To comply with Section 91 of the Town & Country Planning Act 1990. | The development hereby approved shall be carried out in accordance with drawing numbers: Location Plan, A001, A002, L100 Rev B, L101, L102 Rev B, L103.
Reason: For the avoidance of doubt, and in the interests of proper planning.
| All external materials to be used in the development shall match the appearance of those of the existing building, unless otherwise stated in the submitted application form or approved drawings.

Reason: To ensure that the materials harmonise with the surroundings, in accordance with policies 1.1 & 1.2 of the Ealing Core Strategy (2012), policies 7.4 & 7B of the Ealing Development Management Development Plan Document (2013), policies D3 and D4 of the London Plan (2021) and the National Planning Policy Framework (2023).

| Construction of the front wall hereby approved shall not commence until an Arboricultural Method Statement has been submitted to and approved in writing by the local planning authority. This shall demonstrate that, if the foundations of the new front wall need to be deeper than the existing wall, then the new wall must be built on micropyles and lintels ensuring no roots greater than 25mm are cut with any trench for services being dug by hand.  The development shall be implemented in accordance with the approved method statement.

Reason: To ensure appropriate tree protection in the interests of protecting the visual amenity of the area, contributing to the quality and character of London's environment, air quality and adapting to and mitigating climate change in accordance with policies G4, G5 and G7 of the London Plan, policy 5.10 of the Ealing Development Management DPD and the Ealing SPG 9 - Trees and Development Guidelines.
description: Installation of integrated solar panels to side elevation; replacement of fence to side, rear; installation of EV charger to front elevation; alterations to existing front brick wall; construction of brick wall to front; installation of electric gate to front
